asset.author: Sears Product Reviews
asset.hookText:
Get a great deal @ http://www.sears.com/appliances-small-kitchen-appliances-juicers-accessories/b-1348877238

No need to strain your arm muscles extracting every drop of goodness from fruits and veggies, this Hamilton Beach Big Mouth Juice Extractor does all the arm wrestling for you. This stainless steel juice extractor is called Big Mouth for a reason. Its wide feeding chute lets you input large pieces or even whole fruits and vegetables, in most cases, even without peeling. Just drop, press down and voila! Fresh, wholesome juice pours from the spout and the stuff you don't need like peels and seeds collect in a bin on the side. Easy to assemble and use, anyone in the family can plug it in and enjoy a fresh drink. 

Take a closer look: http://www.sears.com/appliances-small-kitchen-appliances-juicers-accessories/b-1348877238
